name: I used to be a Dog
name_original: I used to be a Dog
description:
I used to be a Dog, a visual novel made in 96 for a game jam.
Each action could leads to a different ending.
This is my first take in the visual novel, and I never played a game of this genre...
So, forgive me if it's not great. :)

Controls:   
- WASD or arrow keys to move and select an action. 
- Spacebar to select an action or interact.  

Criteria JamDNA 12:  
- Visual Novel: 
The gameplay is basically text-based and revolves all around player's actions. Each action could leads to a different ending.
- Mysterious: 
the story revolves around the mystery of the main character.
- Animals: 
the main character is a dog and will encounter other animals aswell.
- Extra-diegetic Music: 
The music follows the mood... especially at the end.

Credits: 
All the assets were made from scratch by me for this jam.
8bit sound effects were made with Bfxr.
All other sounds come from Freesound.org:
- Gate opening sound by Sergenious.
- Disappear sound by erlipresidente.
- Piano ending sound by PSOVOD
- Ambient music by ambient-mixer.
Font used: PressStart2P, Apple garamond
Game engine: Stencyl

A game made by havana24.net  
Follow me on twitter @hav24
